page.title: 17Education
page.content: The schools in Brightlingsea cater for three age groups: 5-7 year olds, 7-11 year olds, 11 and upwards. The first group attend{Brightlingsea {County Infants School}which accomodates about 200 pupils. The 7-11 year olds attend {Brightlingsea County Junior School here between 300 and 400 pupils are taught in an open plan environment. Both of these schools are on the same campus off Eastern Road.Children from the Infants School automatically move on to the Juniors. These in turn will attend the{Colne {High School}for their secondary education.This is a Comprehensive School catering for the needs of about 1200 students and is situated on Church Road. A small proportion of children of varying ages attend schools in Colchester.
